div.p: Odoo Access Control Management makes tasks easier and safer by controlling who can access what, ensuring security.

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12
col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 align-self-center

div.h2: Enhancing security and data integrity within the organization
div.p: Odoo is a suite of business software. Odoo covers core departments of any organization like Sales, Purchase, Inventory, Manufacturing, HRMS, Accounting Websites. But there are some limitations like you can not allow or restrict some menu items, action buttons, views. Don’t worry we have a solution for that “Access Management System”, it will open doors for you to restrict/allow specific views, actions buttons, menu items to specific users. Let’s deep dive into the system.

header.h6: Streamline user access with role-based permissions for enhanced security

div.class: sh_inner_box pb-xl-0 pt-lg-0 pt-md-0 pt-sm-0 pb-0 pt-0

div.div: Menu Access allows you to selectively hide or show menu items based on user roles and permissions.

With this feature, you can hide the parent menu for any application, allowing users to access only a particular record from that application which is related to another record. For example, if a user only has sales access but the company wants them to see invoices related to only sales orders, not all, you can utilize this feature.
Field access allows you to set access right on particular fields from any applications.
Like if you want to show the partner name in invoice, but you do not want to change the partner name by that user. That time you can utilize this feature.
This Feature allows you to hide the navbar buttons for particular users.
Like when you want to just show the invoices to your sales person, that time you can hide that action buttons for those users only.

Here in this tool has one feature that you can hide chatter portions for any users and any application. This feature enhances user privacy, reduces clutter, and ensures relevant information is easily accessible to the right individuals.
Administrators can define which applications' chatter feeds can be hidden for individual users or user groups.

Using to hide print report and multi-action buttons for specific applications such as Sales, Purchase, Invoices, and more for particular users can be a valuable feature to enhance security, prevent unauthorized actions, and streamline the user interface.
Administrators can define which applications' print report button can be hidden for individual users or user groups.

This feature allows hiding action buttons such as export, delete, duplicate, and more for specific applications like Sales, Purchase, Invoices, and others for particular users is a valuable feature that enhances data security, prevents accidental data loss, and ensures compliance with organizational policies.
Limiting access to sensitive actions helps mitigate the possibility of accidental data manipulation or deletion, safeguarding critical information.
